alert.note: Alert for Shoshone, Lava Beds (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 7:09PM MST until January 14 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM SATURDAY TO 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Shoshone, Richfield, and Carey. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 8 PM this evening to 8 AM MST Saturday. For the Winter Storm Warning, from 2 PM Saturday to 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
